auto_story_text_normalized: the crowd was ready for the big game . the fans were excited to be there . the cheerleaders were very talented . the band was great . the audience was really good .

edited_stories.edited_story_text: I heard the clacking of drum sticks that night. It started with the band striking up their instruments, filling the void of the stadium with sound and spectacle. An audience, enamored and enhanced by songs of triumph, cheered once the cheerleaders came out. All of them, performing skillfully precised and well rehearsed routines, were outstanding!
